articles.content: The news of veteran Indian leg-spinner Yuzvendra Chahal not making it to the World Cup 2023 roster has left many fans disheartened. Chahal failed to secure a spot in the preliminary squad, finding hi… [+2293 chars]

articles.title: Netherlands have the spunk, but do they have the steel? - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Netherlands are flying the flag for the Associate teams at the World Cup, and they have the power to push some of the bigger teams hard, as they have done before

articles.title: World Cup 2023: Following His Controversial `Fool` Remark, R Ashwin Contacts Ex-India Star - Zee News
articles.description: Before the main event began, veteran India spinner Laxman Sivaramakrishnan raised concern about Ashwins behavior. Siva was widely ridiculed on social media for his opinions, but Ashwin contacted the former India star and asked for help. Watch video on Zee News
